name: 1. COCONUT TAMARIND SALMON CURRY
preparation: Salmon. Clean and dry the salmon. Season salmon with salt, pepper, garlic powder, tamarind, olive oil, lime juice. Put the rice on.

Spices. Cut in small pieces: 1 onion, 2 pieces of ginger, 2 pieces of garlic, 1 piece of pepper, 1 piece of chilli. Hit a pan with some butter or olive oil and put the onion, ginger and garlic. Add some cardamom and cumin seeds and heat for a few minutes. Add the pepper and the chilli. Plus, you can add some black pepper, salt, curry leaves and tamarind paste. After a few minutes, add coconut milk and spice powders (curry, garam masala) and a spoon of tomato sauce.
When it’s all together, put the salmon on the pin and coovert it with the sauce. Cook low heat for 10-15 minutes and put in some coriander.
